meanings.definition: The state of being obsolete or no longer in use.
meanings.sent1: The obsoletenesses of the old computer made it difficult to find replacement parts.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to upgrade their software to avoid obsoletenesses in the future.
meanings.sent3: The obsoletenesses of the VHS tapes made the kids wonder how people used to watch movies.
meanings.sent4: The obsoletenesses of the rotary phone was a reminder of how technology has evolved.
meanings.sent5: The obsoletenesses of the typewriter was evident in the dusty corner of the office.

meanings.definition: The quality of being outdated or no longer relevant.
meanings.sent1: The rapid changes in technology often lead to the obsoletenesses of certain devices.
meanings.sent2: The obsoletenesses of the fashion trend was evident as people started wearing different styles.
meanings.sent3: The obsoletenesses of the old slang words made the teenagers laugh at how their parents used to talk.
meanings.sent4: The obsoletenesses of the traditional methods became apparent when the new approach yielded better results.
meanings.sent5: The obsoletenesses of the manual labor jobs highlighted the shift towards automation in the industry.
